case.state: Oh hi Rainbow! I knew you wouldn't be able to resist wanting to play.
Rarity?! You are the last person I expected to see here!
Oooh! What a nice surprise to find you here, Twilight! Thanks for the invitation by the way!
A game of strip poker? Hee hee, so it's going to be just like the goodbye party I organized at CHS!
Another party, another strip poker game, let's start already!
Let's get this party started!
Welcome everyone to my special easter party!
Seeing all of you girls here tonight just brought me the biggest smile!
Hey there Muffins! Nice of you to join us today, don't worry I won't tell Dinky you were here...
Oooh, a girl hidden with a cloak, how misterious...
So wait... Is your friend not going to get her own hand? Aww...
Uh Rarity... I know you like to show off all the clothes you make but don't you think it is a bit excessive to do it here?
It's not Pinky Mina, is Pinkamena. It's Pinkamena Diane Pie! But how do you even know my full name?
Oooh I like the spirit of this girl, what was your name again? Undies?
A lovely day on the beach to play strip poker!
I would have brought my swimsuit to the beach, but I don't want this game to end on two rounds.
The sand, the sun, it's the perfect place for a game of strip poker!
Whose bedroom is this?
Ahh smart! You already have a bed prepared for after the game and everything...
Nice bedroom ~player~... Very romantic with the view of the stars and everything...
A strip poker game at school? This is getting a lot like CHS!
A classroom? The memories are already flooding back...
I guess this just turnt into a sex-ed class!
Nothing more relaxing than a good hot steamy shower... But before that, we need to get naked!
I can already feel lighter... And once we finish this game we will all be lighter as well!
Steamy and wet, just how I like my strip poker games!
I like what you've done with the place guys... much more lively!
Another party in the inventory huh? This place never changes...
Ahh yes... The locker rooms... you can see some stains on the floor from the last party I organized here...
I guess there's no more fun ways to get changed than with a good strip poker game, am I right?
I guess there's no better place to undress than the locker rooms, am I right?
Ooh.. Fancy, is this your mansion ~player~?
For such a fancy mansion, it's a shame there's only one sofa back there, we could play sitting otherwise.
Nothing more awe inspiring than seeing the moon light pass through those fancy giant windows... Except maybe a good ol' fashioned strip poker game!
Alright people, we can go swimming to the pool later, for now just try to not the get the cards too wet...
I would have brought my swimsuit, but I don't want this game to end on two rounds.
Is it even safe to play so close to the pool? Whatever, let's go!
Fancy... Check!... Private... Check!... Purple?... Uhmmm.... Check?
Quite the fan of purple huh ~player~?
You know I've always wondered what even are those things on the wall patterns... Oh sorry I got distracted for a sec, let's start this thing!
Why are we on the roof? The cards might blow away!
Maybe doing this on the roof in the middle of the day isn't such a good idea... ahh whatever...
Just hold on to your hands well people, we don't want a gust of air to take away my future victory...
An impromptu game of strip poker in the middle of a random street? Sure... I guess it's not the worst I've ever done...
This is a bit more crowded to what I'm used to... but whatever...
Really? Here... I was kinda expecting something more private but... I can deal with this...
Let's get this party started!
Oh yeah!
~cards~ and you better hope they are good ones...
I demand ~cards~ cards.
~cards~ cards... NOW!
I want ~cards~, and they better be good...
Gimme ~cards~ cards.
I'll take ~cards~ cards now.
My random number generator tells me to change ~cards~ cards.
~cards~!
The party demands ~cards~ cards now!
I feel like ~cards~ will be my lucky number this time.
I'll swap ~cards~ cards.
Changing ~cards~ cards sounds fun right about now.
These ~cards~ cards will surely spark up this party!
I haven't even seen my hand, however I still want to change ~cards~ cards.
Let me see here... ~cards~!
Looks really nice, Rarity. Classy, just like you!
Am I really the only girl here? Oh boy I can already tell this is going to be a fun night!
I get to be the only girl here? Well, more fun for me!
Surrounded by handsome men and playing a strip poker game with them? This is going to be a fun night isn't it?
Just one man here, huh? I guess someone just won the Jackpot.
Only one male for us girls, I don't know who is luckier, him or us!
I feel there's a bit of a disparity between males and females in this party...
C'mon, I have no problem with playing with girls, but I'd really like there to be more than one guy in this game!
Huh?... This is unexpected... seems someone in this game has been messing around with stuff they shouldn't... Isn't that right Moinka?
Oh, hello Princess. I don't believe we've met. I'm Pinkamena!
Where are my manners? I better introduce myself to my future victims! My name is Pinkamena Diane Pie, and I'm going to show you all a new kind of fun...
Looks like it's just us now. Maybe if you can beat me, I'll give you a special treat.~
Only you and me left now, no place to run...
So it's just you... and me... Don't think I'm going to make it easy on you.
Do you see that Mr. Turnip? Only one worthless piece of meat left...
If you win, you might get a prize. If you lose...you'll be my prize.
I hope Pinkie won't mind me coming out for a bit, but I can't stand seeing her getting abused by all you guys in this game.
My friend Mr. Turnip says you're all cheating. I tried to tell him that's not possible, but he's convinced!

It still tastes like copper...
I promise the cupcakes are safe! You believe me Mr. Turnip, right?

You'll all understand true joy once the game is over.

Between the two of us, I was hoping it'd come down to this!
Only me and you left, time to see who finishes the party first!
Last two huh? Do you think you have what it takes to beat the party master?
Not to worry anyone here, but I feel a bit weird, like if someone else was trying to come out of me...

Oh well, I guess Mika's friend wasn't staying for the game after all...
Don't worry Mahi, I'm sure after this game, any of the guys I brought to the party will be more than glad to make your night even more fun!
A favourite food? Have you ever had a chimicherrychanga? I guess not, I just made it up, it's like a chimichanga but of cherries. That's a funny name isn't it, say it after me: Chimicherrychanga!
No no no Twilight, what I'm offering to ~player~ is a normal special discount, what I give to you and the rest of our friends is a super duper special discount!
I think that depends on how far each one of us is willing to take the party, Zone, but if the rumours about you're correct, I think you'll be the one with the most fun tonight!
So what brings you to this world again, princess? Is there another evil magical thingy that we need to take care of?
So, you girls are all from the same school huh? I can tell from the uniforms, though I hadn't seen uniforms like that before...
Wow, I didn't think this would happen! I guess we get to find out who likes girls!
This is going to be like one of those sleepovers I did back at CHS! Except a lot more wild!
